subject: Attendance Management System (AMS) for NHAI`s AEs/IEs/ Consultant- reg.
text: HRdy <etv WTf qifearut 7MM / Phone 91-11-25074100/25074200 9T (Hsv Wrde7 #_{THTi @Ta4) Wan/ Fax 91-11-25093507 25093514 National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways) 7-5 Q 6, #42r-10, ERGT, 7} fevif-110075 G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka, New Delhi-110075 NHAI/Policy Guidelines/Consultancy Contracts/2021 No: 10.2.28/2021 dated 15th January, 2021 (Decision taken on e-office file No. NHAI/IT/2021/A-APPIAEs/IEs/Consultant Comp. No. 58031) Sub:- Attendance Management System (AMS) for NHAI's AEs/ IEs/ Consultant: NHAI has developed an advanced Face Recognition location based Mobile Application System (e-Attendance System) to track and monitor attendance of personnel deployed by AEs/ IEs & consultants for the projects. This system is integrated with Data Lake; PMS Portal. The application uses facial recognition, GPS based location identification   enabling a user to mark their daily attendance_ The system will automatically capture date and time of in and out. User will mark their attendance daily by signing- in the morning and sign-out, at the end of the 2_ The e-Attendance System is mandatory with effect from 20 January 2021 for all personnel engineers deployed by AE/ IE/ Consultant as per their contracts. 3 This is issued with the approval of the Competent Authority. (Sheo Shankar Jha) CGM(Coord:) ROs/ PDs - with a request to issue instructions to all AEs/ IEs/Consultants to: 1 _ PS to Chairman 2_ PPS to All Members/CVo 3_ Hindi Officer for translation in Hindi 4. Library for hosting the circular o library site 5 . Web Admin for circulation 6_ GMC, KPMG 7 Ms Amnex infotechnologies Pvt: Ltd. MMT RT RT } NHAI key log log in, day. key Ilkaaey To, Copy
